Feature Notes:
Bestial Fury: Companion makes 2 attacks/rd
Exceptional Training: Companion can Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack; attacks count as magical
Healer: Using healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 HP; healer's kit heals 1d6 + 4 + target HD HP 1/short rest
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast up to CR 1/4 gains +6 AC, attack, damage, skills, and saving throws and obeys self commands
Shelter Of The Faithful: Receive aid from associated temple
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; Insight; Perception; Religion; Stealth

Languages: Celestial; Common; Infernal; Orc
Skill Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv on secret door detection and search for traps at full speed
Favored Enemy: Adv on Survival to track, Adv on Intelligence to recall info about, and learn the language of 3 chosen creature types
Feral Senses: R30' Aware of invisible creatures
Hide In Plain Sight: +10 Stealth to hide using prepared camouflage
Natural Explorer: Gain dbl Int and Wis Proficiency, move normally through difficult terrain, never become lost, remain always alert, stealth alone at full speed, locate dbl food, and gain extra info from tracking in 3 chosen terrain types
Vanish: Hide as bonus action, untrackable nonmagically

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1

Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 AC in armor
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Colossus Slayer: +1d8 HP vs. damaged foe 1/rd
Escape The Horde: Foe Disadv on OA
Feral Senses: No Disadv vs. invisible foe
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with single, one-handed weapon
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Add ability modifier to second attack damage
Foe Slayer: +3 attack or damage vs. favored enemy 1/rd
Giant Killer: Use Reaction to attack adjacent Large or larger foe after miss
Horde Breaker: Second attack on different adjacent foe
Multiattack Defense: +4 AC on additional foe attacks after hit
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Stand Against The Tide: Use Reaction to redirect foe melee miss to another creature
Uncanny Dodge: Use Reaction for half damage
Volley: Ranged attack any number of foes in 10' radius
Whirlwind Attack: Melee attack any number of adjacent foes

Save Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv on trap detection and avoidance and resistance to trap damage
Evasion: Dex save yields no damage instead of half
Land's Stride: Adv on saves vs. impeding plants
Steel Will: Adv on saves vs. fright

Spells:
Animal Friendship (R1 Ench): R30' Target beast convinced of good intent (Wis neg) for 1 dy
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self perceives through touched beast's senses for conc or 1 hr
Color Spray (W1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd
Commune With Nature (R5 Divi): Self gains 3 facts about nature w/in 3 miles (300' underground)
Conjure Barrage (R3 Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type (Dex half)
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons obedient fey creatures for conc or 1 hr
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack w/in 30', inflict 1d6 HP piercing (Dex neg) for 8 hr
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 HP
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/rd piercing (Str neg) for conc or 1 min
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Cha checks w/target for conc or 1 min
Grasping Vine (R4 Conj): R30' Vine pulls target 20' (Dex neg) for conc or 1 min
Jump (R1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (R2 Abju): Targets in 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become untrackable for conc or 1 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Overgrows 100' radius or enriches 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Swift Quiver (R5 Tran): Touched quiver contains endless ammo, gives extra attack for conc or 1 min
Water Breathing (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 1 dy
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Primeval Awareness: Use spell slot to sense creatures in 1 mile (favored terrain 6 miles) for 1 min/spell level
Share Spells: R30' Self spell also affects companion
